price: Yeroo Qur'aanni isaan irratti qara'amu hinsujuudan. {1}
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
